name: Loopdy loop
description:
This game was meant to be for the Black and White game jam 8 but it is unfinished due to time constraints and lack of motivation.
Perhaps I was too ambitious with it.
The was also some problems with the registering ofthe mouse button being clicked.

For some reason the clicking wouldn't work for other objects just one. Also unity beta wouldn't let me to renew my license for a while due to a bug.

I'm sorry I couldn't finish it but you can try out whatever Is left. It's not much but it's better than nothing.
